com.gwtsystem.server.dao

Interface ICustomerDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGenericDao<Customer,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDao

    public interface ICustomerDao
extends IGenericDao<Customer,java.lang.Long>
    Interface for implementation by CustomerDao class for specific operations with Customer-entity
    See Also:
    Created by alexanderleonovich on 02.08.15.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Long countCustomers()
      Implementation of this method will return count of Customers in database

      Implementation of this method will return List of Customers by input parameters
      java.util.List<Customer> getLastModifiedCustomers()
      Implementation of this method will return List of Customers Order by Last modified date sort by descending

    • Method Detail

      • countCustomers

        java.lang.Long countCustomers()
                              throws DaoException
        Implementation of this method will return count of Customers in database
        Returns:
        - count of whole customers in database
        Throws:
        DaoException - - custom Exception class for handle exceptions on DAO layer in application

      • getLastModifiedCustomers

        java.util.List<Customer> getLastModifiedCustomers()
                                                  throws DaoException
        Implementation of this method will return List of Customers Order by Last modified date sort by descending
        Returns:
        - List of Customers
        Throws:
        DaoException - - custom Exception class for handle exceptions on DAO layer in application

      • getCustomerByMetaPhones

        Implementation of this method will return List of Customers by input parameters
        Parameters:
        metaphones - - list of metaphone -keys for search
        Returns:
        list of Customers
        Throws:
        DaoException - - custom Exception class for handle exceptions on DAO layer in application
